ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمْ وَحُسْنُ مَـَٔابٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who have iman and do right actions, happiness will be theirs and a wonderful Homecoming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who believe and do the right, have happiness, and an excellent resting place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So those who believe (in the message of the Truth) and do good are destined for happiness and a blissful end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The righteously striving believers will receive abundant blessings and the best eternal dwelling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Those who accepted faith and did good deeds – for them is joy and an excellent outcome.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who believed, and work righteousness, Tuba is for them and a beautiful place of (final) return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those who believe and do good, a good final state shall be theirs and a goodly return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: of those who believe and do righteous deeds; theirs is blessedness and a fair resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who believe and do right: Joy is for them, and bliss (their) journey's end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds -- blissful is their end."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who believe and work righteous works, for them is bliss and a happy resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds—happy are they and good is their [ultimate] destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For those who believe and work righteousness, is (every) blessedness, and a beautiful place of (final) return."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah - Islamic Monotheism), and work righteousness, Tuba (it means all kinds of happiness or name of a tree in Paradise) is for them and a beautiful place of (final) return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For those who believe and do good works is blessedness and blessed resort'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For those who believe and do righteous deeds—for them is happiness and a beautiful return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [13:29] those who believe and perform righteous deeds: (alladhīna āmanū wa-‘amilū’l-sālihāt is the subject, the predicate of which [is the following]) theirs shall be blessedness (tūbā is a verbal noun derived from tīb, ‘goodness’, or [the name of] a tree in Paradise, whose shade a mounted traveller travelling for 100 years would still not traverse) and a fair resort, [a fair] place to return to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and do right) acts of worship such none is aware of them except Allah: (Joy is for them) blessedness is for them; it is also said that this refers to a tree in Paradise, the trunk of which is made of gold and the leaves of vestments, the fruits of different colours and whose branches are in succession in Paradise, and under which are dunes of musk, ambergris and saffron, (and bliss (their) journey's end) Paradise is their returning place.
